title: FOR SALE: 1887 N28 Allen & Ginter John Clarkson PSA 6 (BASEBALL)
author: PASPORTZ

posts.post_title: FOR SALE: 1887 N28 Allen & Ginter John Clarkson PSA 6 (BASEBALL)
posts.post_content:
$1200 delivered. Paypal FF, reg paypal add 3%, check or MO

For sale is a Allen and Ginter John Clarkson PSA 6. A chance to own one of the few baseball players in the set in a respectable grade.

High resolution pictures included.
Great card, good luck with the sale
